data.system_settings: Android 4.4.4, Tablet Allview Viva H8 LTE
data.actual_result: The logout button is white and almost not visible
data.expected_result: The logout button should have a black shade (dark theme color) just like the other buttons
data.short_description: Log out button doesn't update once with the theme
data.steps_to_repro: - Make sure you use the light theme on your device - Go to settings (user settings) - Observe the log out button
